                       int[] blockData)

Parameters:
levelData -
blockData - TODO: Fix errors/bugs when trying to pick up or place blocks on the left or right side of the map.

move

public void move(int[] levelData)
With playerLoc, playerLocX, and the corresponding Y values, the player's position in the map can be determined by the top left corner of the "imaginary" block. playerLocXX and playerLocYY then determine the exact position on the map.

Parameters:
levelData -
